name: Data visualization component collection
description:
Portfolio project #3

Component collection & final design


A collection of multi-purpose components in different genres for a data visualization software project. Designed specifically for desktop screens and can be easily converted to other screens. 100% component-driven design runs on a scalable Figma design system with design tokens, variants, responsive components, and nested components.


Design architecture is ideal for small to large projects, with a design team of 5 or more.
